qas.question: Euro1080 was a division of what former company?
What "chicken or the egg" stalemate prompted Euro1080 to broadcast HDTV channels?

answers.text: "no HD broadcasts mean no HD TVs bought means no HD broadcasts ..."

qas.question: What was Euro1080 hoping to kick-start by broadcasting HDTV channels?

What was on HD1 for 4 or 5 hours per day?

answers.text: a multi-lingual soundtrack on a rolling schedule
